title: Japan raids Coincheck offices after $530 mln heist
text:
Japan raids Coincheck offices after $530 mln heist 1:04pm GMT - 01:13 
Japan's financial regulator raided the offices of cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck and said it had asked them to fix flaws in their computer networks well before hackers stole $530 million of digital money last week. Ryan Brooks reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Japan's financial regulator raided the offices of cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck and said it had asked them to fix flaws in their computer networks well before hackers stole $530 million of digital money last week. Ryan Brooks reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nAKFYp
